resources.string:
"You don't have any contacts to display.
To add contacts, press "Menu" and touch:
"
"Accounts to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
"New contact to create a new contact from scratch "" "
"Import/Export to import contacts from your USIM or SD card "" "

"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)
To add contacts, press "Menu" and touch:
"
"Accounts to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
"Display options to change which contacts are visible "" "
"New contact to create a new contact from scratch "" "
"Import/Export to import contacts from your USIM or SD card "" "
Position %1$d on USIM card is not valid, should between %2$d and %3$d
Error occurs when searching USIM card contacts
